page.title: Nexent
page.subtitle: One prompt, infinite possibilities
page.description: No orchestration, no complex drag-and-drop required. Integrate data, models, and tools into one intelligent hub.
page.dataProtection: Secure and reliable enterprise-grade data protection

features.title: Multi-Agent Self-Decision
features.description: Leveraging the ReAct framework to enable autonomous thinking, task planning, decision-making, and execution among multiple agents, automating model, data, and toolset integration within the MCP ecosystem.

features.title: Scalable Data Preparation
features.description: Enterprise-grade scalable processing, slicing, and vectorization data framework that supports building high-quality multimodal knowledge bases from different file formats and data sources.

features.title: Intelligent Source Integration
features.description: MCP-powered tools connecting multiple knowledge bases, web sources, and data streams with business-driven data acquisition strategies, featuring end-to-end multimodal knowledge traceability and explainability.

features.title: Native MCP Orchestration
features.description: Supports seamless MCP tool onboarding and invocation, enabling sophisticated business logic implementation and workflow automation.

features.title: Comprehensive Knowledge Attribution
features.description: Provides full-stack information source tracking, ensuring response reliability and verifiability with complete audit trails.

features.title: Multi-Modal Communication
features.description: Built on multimodal knowledge bases and advanced data processing capabilities, delivering next-gen AI agent services with native support for text, image, audio, and beyond.
